wikipedia_page.main: George Charles Calder "Tich" Palliser,  (11 January 1919 – 24 September 2011) was a Royal Air Force fighter pilot and flying ace of the Second World War. Palliser flew during the Battle of Britain and, at the time of his death, was one of the last survivors of "The Few".

response: * George Palliser (born 1919), British Royal Air Force fighter pilot
* George Palliser, founder of Palliser, Palliser & Company
* "Titch" – George Palliser, Battle of Britain pilot
